reviewText: Last week I wanted my dose of sleaze and decided to play my VHS copies of Sleazemania and Sleazemania Strikes Back. To my disappointment, my old VCR has bit the dust and ate my tape. I decided to go to Amazon.com to see if it was still available. Even better, it's now available on DVD.  Or so I thought. I ordered it, and got it and put it in my dvd player. Big surprise, there are segments missing on Sleazemania Strikes Back portion. No INVASION OF THE BLOOD FARMERS, No BLOOD FARM, No UNCLE SY & THE SIRENS. WTF??? This was suppose to be complete. I saved portions from the tape on my PC. I'm not imagining things. On the dvd it mentions these segments on the credits...but where are they?? Are they Easter Eggs? I hate being taken like this. I'm surprised at Johnny Legend for putting more soft core in its place. I always thought when something was put on dvd they added extras...not took stuff out! Be warned fans. NOT COMPLETE!! Very disappointed.
Sleazemania gone digital - dreams can come true!

All three of the one hour each 1980's Sleazemania series are included here. What you get are a bunch of coming attractions trailers for exploitation films from the 1930's to the 1970's with a few short nudie pin ups and interviews by Johnny Legend thrown in for good measure. See trailers for such masterpieces of the cinema as "Marijuana Weed WIth Roots In Hell", "The Smut Peddler", "The Demented, the Damned and the Depraved", "This Little Girl Has Knockers" (Say what?) and many others. Some topless and full frontal nudity, a couple of rather gory trailers, lots of Ed Woodand some cartoon intermission trailers. Three hours of trash for one low price! If you like this weird stuff like I do you'll be pleased, if you don't you'll be bored silly and probably demand your money back! Billy Bob says check it out!
